civilopediaText.text: A place were you can react and throw opinions to various trends, ideas, items, people and anything up to date. This is also were the talent reactors live.

name: Channel 10
uniques: [+2 Happiness] from [Luxury resource] tiles [in this city]

civilopediaText.text: Channel 10 is a home shopping channel dedicated for selling different stuff all around Reactorland. You can buy a large variety of items and things in this channel. (But please, don't make fun of the live seller, m'kay?)
